word: G5253 - ὑπερῷον - hyperōion - hoop-er-o'-on - Upper chamber

sections.paragraph: the highest part of the house, the upper rooms or story where the women resided
Part(s) of speech: Noun Neuter / பெயர்ச்சொல் (அஃறிணை)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Neuter of a derivative of G5228; a higher part of the house, that is, apartment in the third story: - upper chamber (room).
